name: Christopher Carlander
obverse: Bust of Christopher Carlander facing right.
obverse_inscriptions: CHRISTOPH. CARLANDER PER X LUSTRA MED. DOCTOR MERITISS.
reverse: Inscription in 5 lines enclosed in a wreath.
references: Minnespenningar öfver enskilda personer födda eller verksamma i Finland
description: Christopher Carlander was a Swedish doctor.
